desc: Do you honestly expect me to say anything other than 'The meaning to life, the universe, everything'? I didn't think so.
A robot. Typically built to automate things. In this case, story-telling.
You came to the wrong place for that discussion I'm afraid.
Put your thumb and forefinger to your chin as if deep in thought. Now repeat after me, 'Yes'. You have just successfully channelled your inner Kim.
